00007 bool cgi_var( Cgicc *cgi, const string &name, string &val ) {
00008     const_form_iterator fi = cgi->getElement(name);
00009     if( fi != cgi->getElements().end() ) {
00010             val = fi->getValue();
00011             return true;
00012     }
00013     val = "";
00014     return false;
00015 }

00017 bool cgi_ck( const vector<HTTPCookie> * cks, const string & ck, string & v ) {
00018     vector<HTTPCookie>::const_iterator ptr = cks->begin(), end = cks->end();
00019     for( ; ptr!=end; ptr++ ) {
00020             if( stringsAreEqual(ptr->getName(), ck) ) {
00021                     v = ptr->getValue();
00022                     return true;
00023             }
00024     }
00025     v = "";
00026     return false;
